title: Expansion Broadcast
description:
Expansion Broadcast (EXBC) was a podcast I cofounded and ran with the aid of my crewmates for over 10 years. EXBC went through many iterations. Initially it focused as an internet radio broadcast, then a live Friday evening event, and finally found its calling as a weekly podcast focusing on underground electronic music in the Washington, DC area.

I managed the weekly DJ schedule, day-to-day operations, design, and maintenance of the website.
